程序包 P2V

类 VPoly

java.lang.Object
P2V.VObj
P2V.VPoly
public class VPoly extends VObj
VPoly is a class that represents a polygon visual object in the application. It extends the VObj abstract class and inherits its properties and methods. However, some methods or properties are not available or readonly in VPoly, such as Posi, Widt, Heit.
作者:
Telsa

  • 构造器详细资料

    • VPoly

      public VPoly()
      Default constructor for VPoly. Creates a VPoly object with default vertex positions and color settings.

    • VPoly

      public VPoly(VXy... p) throws Exception
      Constructor for VPoly that allows specifying the vertex positions.
      参数:
      p - Array of VXy objects representing the vertex positions.
      抛出:
      Exception - If the number of parameters is odd.

    • VPoly

      public VPoly(float... p) throws Exception
      Constructor for VPoly that allows specifying the vertex positions.
      参数:
      p - Array of float values representing the vertex positions.
      抛出:
      Exception - If the number of parameters is odd.

    • VPoly

      public VPoly(Variable... p) throws Exception
      Constructor for VPoly that allows specifying the vertex positions.
      参数:
      p - Array of Variable objects representing the vertex positions.
      抛出:
      Exception - If the number of parameters is odd.

    • VPoly

      public VPoly(int a, int r, int g, int b, VXy... p)
      Constructor for VPoly that allows specifying the vertex positions and color.
      参数:
      a - Alpha value of the fill color.
      r - Red value of the fill color.
      g - Green value of the fill color.
      b - Blue value of the fill color.
      p - Array of VXy objects representing the vertex positions.

    • VPoly

      public VPoly(int a, int r, int g, int b, float... p) throws Exception
      Constructor for VPoly that allows specifying the vertex positions and color.
      参数:
      a - Alpha value of the fill color.
      r - Red value of the fill color.
      g - Green value of the fill color.
      b - Blue value of the fill color.
      p - Array of float values representing the vertex positions.
      抛出:
      Exception - If the number of parameters is odd.

    • toMovePolyRela

      public void toMovePolyRela(float x, float y)
      Moves the VPoly relative to its current position by the specified amount. Please note that this method directly changes position of each coordinate.
      参数:
      x - The amount to move the VPoly horizontally.
      y - The amount to move the VPoly vertically.

      public void toMovePoly(float x, float y)
      Moves the VPoly to the specified position. Please note that this method directly changes position of each coordinate.
      参数:
      x - The x-coordinate of the new position.
      y - The y-coordinate of the new position.

    • toMovePoly

      public void toMovePoly(VXy xy)
      Moves the VPoly to the specified position using animation. Please note that this method directly changes position of each coordinate
      参数:
      xy - The new position as a VXy object.

    • toMoveVertexesByRotating

      public void toMoveVertexesByRotating(float f)
      Move the vertexes of the VPoly by rotating using animation. Please note that this method directly modifies the position of each coordinate.
      参数:
      f - The angle by which to rotate the vertexes.

    • actualMoveVertexesByRotating

      Moves the vertexes of the VPoly by rotating.
